data.comment: The match has started.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo awards San Luis a goal kick.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of San Luis.
In the minute 7, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Pachuca's Victor Davila breaks free at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 10, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in San Luis.
San Luis attack but Pablo Barrera's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 11, Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
San Luis have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, An attacking Pachuca player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Goal! Victor Davila gives Pachuca the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for San Luis at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 24, Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
San Luis's Luis Leon gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 27, Free kick San Luis.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
Ramiro Gonzalez is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 29, Ramiro Gonzalez is back on his feet again.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Pachuca a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis.
In the minute 30, Erick Aguirre is booked for the home team.
Pachuca move into a 2-0 lead through a Victor Davila header.
Felipe Pardo with an assist there.
In the minute 34, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
Free kick San Luis.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Pachuca throw-in in San Luis's half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Throw-in for Pachuca close to the penalty box.
Oscar Macias Romo waits before resuming play because Oscar Murillo for Pachuca is still down.
In the minute 39, Oscar Murillo returns to the field for Pachuca after picking up a slight injury.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for San Luis at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as San Luis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can San Luis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
It's a goal kick for the away team in Pachuca de Soto.
In the minute 43, Throw-in San Luis.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 45, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
At Estadio Miguel Hidalgo the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Pachuca are pushing forward but Leonardo Ramos's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Oscar Macias Romo awards San Luis a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Pachuca.
Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
The second half has started at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 46, Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
Kevin Alvarez is replacing Erick Aguirre for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca.
San Luis awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
German Berterame for San Luis drives towards goal at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Pachuca to take a throw-in in San Luis territory.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Oscar Murillo for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a San Luis goal kick.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
In the minute 53, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca drive forward through Leonardo Ramos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Attention is being given to San Luisâ€™s German Berterame and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 58, Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
San Luis's German Berterame is back in action after a slight knock.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 59, In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto Pachuca attack through Felipe Pardo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 60, Oscar Macias Romo awards San Luis a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a San Luis throw-in in Pachuca's half.
The away team replace Ventura Alvarado with Enrique Lopez.
In the minute 62, Throw-in San Luis.
It's now 3-0 in Pachuca de Soto as Victor Davila scores for Pachuca.
That's a fine assist from Erick Sanchez.
In the minute 64, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
Paulo Pezzolano is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo with Roberto Nurse replacing Leonardo Ramos.
Romario Ibarra is replacing Felipe Pardo for the home team.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for San Luis in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to San Luis's area.
Victor Guzman is on a sub for Luis Chavez for Pachuca.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of San Luis.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a fifth substitution, with Miguel Herrera replacing Oscar Murillo.
San Luis to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in San Luis's half?
In the minute 75, Oscar Macias Romo signals a San Luis throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Pachuca have a dangerous throw-in.
Oscar Macias Romo blows against Pachuca's Victor Davila for offside.
In the minute 77, Free kick for San Luis in the half of Pachuca.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Throw-in for San Luis in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 79, San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Pachuca de Soto.
San Luis have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 80, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a header from Ramiro Gonzalez.
Great play from Pablo Barrera to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio Miguel Hidalgo.
In the minute 81, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 83, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis.
Jorge Hernandez (Pachuca) gets a yellow card.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Matias Catalan (San Luis) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
San Luis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to San Luis in their own half.
In Pachuca de Soto a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 89, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Victor Davila for Pachuca is whistled offside.
Free kick for San Luis in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Pachuca.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of San Luis.
The second-half is over. The match ends 3-1.
Camilo Mayada (San Luis) has received a first yellow card.
